Title: Samantaral
Actors: Aparajita Adhya, Tanushree Chakraborty, Parambrata Chatterjee, Soumitra Chatterjee
Plot: Samantaral (Parallel) is a 2017 Bengali psychological drama featuring Parambrata Chatterjee and Riddhi Sen in lead roles. Arko ( Riddhi Sen ) returns to his 'mamarbari' (maternal uncles' ...
